questions.question: Catholics can support the work of Caritas Australia during Lent by giving money to

choices.answer: Charitable People.
Helping Hands.
Mercy Ministry.
Project Compassion.

questions.question: Why does Jesus heal a Leper? (Mk 1:40-42).

choices.answer: To show his power and greatness.
Because he felt sorry for him.
To show the love and forgiveness of God.
Because he was a doctor.

questions.question: Jesus said, “I have longed to eat this Passover with you before I suffer.” Jesus said this

choices.answer: at the Last Supper.
when he was feeding the five thousand.
when visiting Mary and Martha.
when he was having a meal at Zaccheus’ house.

questions.question: After the priest reads the Gospel at Mass, he says, “The Gospel of the Lord.” Our response is

choices.answer: “Blessed be God forever.”
“Holy, Holy, Holy Lord God of hosts.”
“Lord, hear our prayer.”
“Praise to you, Lord Jesus Christ.”

questions.question: During the Mass, what happens in the Liturgy of the Word?

choices.answer: We receive Jesus in Holy Communion.
We pray the great prayer of thanksgiving.
We listen to readings from Holy Scripture.
We are sent forth by the priest.
